6.12. elsif Macro

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !elsif value

The arguments are:

Name Type Default Rule
value condition    

See Understanding Macro Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The elsif macro delimits sections within conditional text. It is identical in operation to the elseif macro.

Examples
